cuisine.name: Bengali
cuisine.description: Authentic Bengali cuisine featuring traditional dishes like macher jhol, shorshe ilish, and more.

cuisine.name: Maharashtrian
cuisine.description: Delicious Maharashtrian food with specialties like vada pav, pav bhaji, and puran poli.

cuisine.name: South Indian
cuisine.description: Traditional South Indian dishes including dosas, idlis, and sambar.

cuisine.name: Chettinad
cuisine.description: Spicy and aromatic Chettinad cuisine with a range of curries and rice dishes.

cuisine.name: Punjabi
cuisine.description: Hearty Punjabi food with a variety of parathas, butter chicken, and dal makhani.

cuisine.name: Rajasthani
cuisine.description: Rich and spicy Rajasthani cuisine including dishes like dal baati churma and laal maas.

cuisine.name: Goan
cuisine.description: Seafood delights and Goan specialties like vindaloo, xacuti, and sorpotel.

cuisine.name: Hyderabadi
cuisine.description: Famous for its Hyderabadi biryani and other traditional dishes like haleem and kebabs.

cuisine.name: Kashmiri
cuisine.description: Kashmiri cuisine with specialties like Rogan Josh, Yakhni, and Gustaba.

cuisine.name: Kerala
cuisine.description: Delicious Kerala cuisine with dishes like appam, stew, and Kerala sadya.
